name: Richard SMITH, Petitioner v. PHILADELPHIA CO. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Smith v. Philadelphia Co. Court of Common Pleas

parties: Richard SMITH, Petitioner v. PHILADELPHIA CO. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of April, 2013, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
65 A.3d 301
Richard SMITH, Petitioner v. PHILADELPHIA CO. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS, Respondent.
No. 15 EM 2013.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 19, 2013.
